attributes.action: Understand cannabis is a medication and not a street drug??? Is helps with pain
attributes.additional_details:
We're doing it so wrong keeping it illegal because people are smoking what they can get hold of rather than what there actual body needs!This is why people are going crazy....... 
IF WE HAD THE THE CHANCE TO BE ABLE TO GO INTO A SHOP AND SEE THE DIFFERENT STRAINS WITH THERE EXACT EFFECTS THIS WOULD HELP WITH MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES CAUSED BY CANNABIS AND ALSO JUST GENERAL PAIN, DEPRESSION, ANXIETY, INSOMNIA AND MANY MANY MORE ILLNESS'S!

Check this site and understand more
https://www.leafly.com
attributes.background: Do you understand how many people are in pain and are suffering with so many different illness's there's no cure?Do you not understand that cannabis will take the pain away,some will make you think differently, some types will stop you from feeling anxious some might even make you feel anxious...

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want cannabis to be made legal for medicinal purposes, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163778
